title: Hearthkeeper
description: Bored and frustrated by the role society has trapped him in, Julian Sharpe searches for any way to break the tedium. But when he’s blackmailed by the Gallevan Intelligence Service into spying on his wealthy husband, Jules’ life gets a little too interesting.Rating: NC-17Warnings: BDSM dynamics, both healthy and unhealthy; impact play; erotic humiliation; promiscuity; cultural non-monogamy; substance abuse/dependenceWords:102893 complete
author: Cordelia Kingsbridge
